19 class TestVevent < Test::Unit::TestCase
20 
21   # Create a calendar with an event for each test.
22   def setup
23     @cal = Icalendar::Calendar.new
24     @event = Icalendar::Event.new
25   end
26 
27   def test_new
28     assert(@event)
29   end
30   
31   # Properties that can only occur once per event
32   def test_single_properties
33     @event.ip_class = "PRIVATE"
34     
35     @cal.add_component(@event)
36     
37     cals = Icalendar::Parser.new(@cal.to_ical).parse
38     cal2 = cals.first
39     event2 = cal2.events.first
40     
41     assert_equal("PRIVATE", event2.ip_class)
42   end
